label: Is Present
description: Checks that a specific attribute is present on each extracted node. Supported attributes depend on the extracted target type: image (alt, title, url), link (title, url), code (lang), listItem (checked), paragraph (content), heading (depth). You can also specify any custom field name extracted earlier in the pipeline.
rationale: Prevents missing required attributes on extracted elements.

target.description: Field name to require on each extracted node (e.g., alt, title, url).

requiresPrevious.message: isPresent needs a previous extract step.
